XMVP.Story: { "title": "Deeply Ridiculous", "synopsis": "When a Japanese research submarine accidentally awakens a monstrous, fashion-conscious sea creature, a ragtag crew must use their wits, questionable gadgets, and a lot of seaweed to survive.", "characters": [ "Captain Kaito Noodle", "Professor Squiggles and Dr. Bubbles", "The Sushi Squad", "The Koi 9000", "Finnigan Flounder", "Taggart Trout", "Trillian Tuna", "Gustafson Guppy" ], "theme": "Satire" }
